property.name: customClass
property.label: Custom Class Name
property.description: Custom CSS class name. Usually remains blank.

property.name: variant
property.label: Display Option
property.description: Select the default format of the card. Options are: None (flat) or Featured (drop shadow), Outline (flat with border).

property.name: displayTitle
property.label: Show Adventure Title
property.description: Display the title for the adventure.

property.name: displaySubTitle
property.label: Show Adventure Subtitle
property.description: Select to display the adventure subtitle.

property.name: displayDescription
property.label: Show Adventure Description
property.description: Select to display the adventure description.

property.name: showCloneButton
property.label: Show Clone Button
property.description: Select to display the Full Clone Button.

property.name: showOwner
property.label: Show Owner
property.description: Select to display the owner of the adventure.

property.name: showSource
property.label: Show Source
property.description: Select to display the source of the adventure.

property.name: showTaskRemaining
property.label: Show Tasks Remaining
property.description: Select to display number of task remaining.

property.name: showPercentComplete
property.label: Show Percent Complete
property.description: Select to show the percent of all tasks for the adventure that are complete.

property.name: showViewOtherAdventures
property.label: Show View Other Adventures
property.description: Select to display a link which navigates to Adventure list

property.name: exploreOtherAdventuresAPI
property.label: View Other Adventures Page API Name
property.description: Leave blank to use the default list page for 7S Adventure object. For a custom list page, enter the page API name.

property.name: listId
property.label: Component Group
property.description: Unique ID to link complimentary components together to share data.
